status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
Hi all,

I've been getting this non-deterministic seg fault when writing out parquet files via Dask. I was wondering if anyone could help me figure out what the stack trace means and I can probably triage the issue from there.
{code:java}
// code placeholder
epee:23196] *** Process received signal ***
